name: Vikings - Wolves of Midgard
description: Vikings â€“ Wolves of Midgard takes you to the Shores of Midgard, a world based upon the mythology and history of the Vikings, but with a fantasy twist. Battle the fearsome Jotan, hordes of terrifying undead monstrosities and the beasts of Ragnarok, as you strive to survive the growing cold of Fimbulwinter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 64Bit Versions Processor: Intel Compatible 2.1 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX460 2GB or compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 64Bit Versions Processor: Intel Core i7 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
